necessary.label: Necessary cookies
necessary.description: Used to store your settings in a cookie. Cannot be disabled.
tracking.label: Tracking cookie (Google Analytics)
tracking.description: Used to analyse site performance and usage. The data is collected anonymously.
banner.heading: Cookie settings
banner.description: This website uses cookies to continually improve the user experience on the site. Select "ok" to confirm your choices or "Set my preferences" for more details and to manage your options.
